Text Decoration

# Text Decoration

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                | Support        |
| -------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
underline
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
line-through
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
no-underline
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
overline
```     | 🌐 Web only    |
